title: BURN IN ME, FIRE OF GOD
bible_ref: His word is in my heart like a fire. Jer.20:9
verses: Burn in me, Fire of God,=Burn till my heart is pure;=Burn till Your life shines out in me,=Steadfast and strong and sure.
Burn in me, Fire of God,=Spare not for price nor pain;=Burn till all dross of earth consume,=Only Your gold remain.
Burn in me, Fire of God,=Burn till Your eyes can see=Jesus' own image, strong and sure,=Formed by Your grace in me!
